<<<<<<< HEAD
VVheresoeuer you see mee, trust vnto your selfe. Or, The mysterie of lending and borrowing Seria iocis: or, the tickling torture. By Thomas Povvel, London-Cambrian. Powell, Thomas, 1572?-1635?
[8], 55, 58-60, [2] p.
Printed [at Eliot's Court Press] for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-noster-row, at the signe of the Talbot, London : 1623.
Identification of printer from STC. Running title reads: Wheresoeuer you see me, trust to your selfe. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
